cards.hero-trigger: After rolling a check
cards.hero-description:
Reroll the check twice, taking the best result of the three.

If you still fail the check, treat the failure as a Critical Failure.

cards.hero-trigger: Play during your turn
cards.hero-description: You can use Attacks of Opportunity at no reaction cost until the beginning of your next turn on a successful Acrobatics or Athletics check against your target's Fortitude DC.

cards.hero-trigger: Play during your turn
cards.hero-description:
Designate a target.

Gain a +2 Status bonus to attack rolls against this target.

Take a -4 Status penalty against everyone else.


This effect lasts for 1 minute. On a Critical Hit dealt on the target, the timer restarts.

cards.hero-trigger: After making 2 successful consecutive attacks against the same target
cards.hero-description:
The target takes 1d6 persistent bleed damage for 1 minute and is Sickened 1 until the bleeding stops.


If you are 7th level or higher, increase the bleeding damage to 2d6.

If you are 12th level or higher, increase the bleeding damage to 3d6.

cards.hero-trigger:
When making a ranged attack

(Either with strike or spell)
cards.hero-description:
The range of a ranged weapon becomes 2x for the attack.

The range of a spell becomes 1.5x for the attack.

cards.hero-trigger: When an enemy within 30ft makes an attack against another creature
cards.hero-description:
The target is fascinated with you, and it can't end this condition until it takes a hostile action against you, or the combat ends.

This cancels the initial attack.

cards.hero-trigger: Play during your turn
cards.hero-description:
Until the end of your next turn, you can Activate one magic item that you have already activated once today.

This activation doesn't count against the item's frequency limit if the limit is once per day or a shorter increment of time.

If the item is a wand, activating it this way doesn't overcharge it.

cards.hero-trigger: At the end of your turn
cards.hero-description:
Select a target within 30ft. The target you choose must have fewer than half their total HP.

The target gains a number of temporary HP equal to twice your level, which lasts until the end of the encounter.

cards.hero-trigger: Play during your turn
cards.hero-description:
Make a Strike, ignoring the multiple attack penalty.

If the attack fails, you release your weapon, or drop prone if you were using an unarmed attack.

cards.hero-trigger: Anytime
cards.hero-description:
Select one untrained skill. You are trained in that skill for 1 minute.

If during this time, you roll a Failure or Critical Failure in the selected skill, the effect ends.

cards.hero-trigger: After a successful melee attack
cards.hero-description: You unleash a terrifying battle cry. Attempt an Intimidation check to Demoralize and compare the result against all enemies within 30ft as a Free Action.

cards.hero-trigger: Play during your turn
cards.hero-description:
Until the start of your next turn, you gain a +2 Status bonus to checks based on the key ability score of your class.

If your class grants a choice for its key ability, select one of those ability scores to gain the bonus.

cards.hero-trigger: Play during your turn
cards.hero-description:
Until the start of your next turn, you gain a +2 Status bonus to checks based on the ability scores that are boosted by your ancestry (ignoring free boosts).

If your ancestry only grants free boosts, select one ability score to gain the bonus to instead.

cards.hero-trigger: Play on a Will save
cards.hero-description:
You succeed at the saving throw.

You gain the Stupefied 1 condition, which lasts until the next time you get a full night's rest.

cards.hero-trigger: Play on a Reflex save
cards.hero-description:
You succeed at the saving throw.

You gain the Clumsy 1 condition, which lasts until the next time you get a full night's rest.

cards.hero-trigger: Play on a Fortitude save
cards.hero-description:
You succeed at the saving throw.

You gain the Drained 1 condition, which lasts until the next time you get a full night's rest.

cards.hero-trigger: Play when rolling to get rid of persistent damage
cards.hero-description: You get advantage on the roll as well as a +2 Status bonus.

cards.hero-trigger: Play during your turn
cards.hero-description: Once during your turn, you can Activate an item to Cast a Spell, even if you can't normally cast spells or don't have that spell on your spell list.

cards.hero-trigger: Play at the start of your turn, when you have the frightened condition
cards.hero-description: You lose the frightened condition and instead gain a +2 Status bonus to Attack Rolls and Skill checks until the end of your turn.

cards.hero-trigger: Play when you take damage
cards.hero-description: Until the start of your next turn, any damage that would reduce you to 0 HP leaves you with 1HP remaining and gives you the Doomed 1 condition, or increases your Doomed value by 1.

cards.hero-trigger: Play at the start of a Stride
cards.hero-description:
During the Stride, you must move in a straight line, but you can attempt to Shove any creature in your way with a +2 Status bonus, moving it to an adjacent space out of the way of your movement.

The multiple attack penalty doesn't apply to any of these free Shove attempts, nor do they increase your multiple attack penalty.

If you fail to Shove a creature out of your way, your movement ends immediately.

cards.hero-trigger: Play after you end your movement adjacent to a creature at least 2 sizes larger than you
cards.hero-description:
Move to any space directly around that creature.

This free movement doesn't trigger any reactions based on movement.

cards.hero-trigger: Play after casting a spell
cards.hero-description:
The spell's power reverberates in your mind.

You can Cast this Spell one additional time without having it prepared or expending a spell slot.

If you don't Cast the Spell by the end of your next turn, it is lost.

After Casting the Spell again, you become Stupefied 2 for 1 minute or increase your Stupefied level by 2.

Any material components consumed by the spell are still consumed.

cards.hero-trigger: Play after casting a spell
cards.hero-description:
You surround yourself with an aura of residual magic power.

Until the start of your next turn, you gain resistance to all damage equal to the level of the spell you just cast.

cards.hero-trigger: Play when you take two consecutive Stride actions
cards.hero-description:
You make a free ranged Strike at any point during this movement.

Your multiple attack penalty doesn't apply to this free Strike, nor does it increase your multiple attack penalty.

cards.hero-trigger: Play when you take two consecutive Stride actions
cards.hero-description:
You make a free melee Strike at any point during this movement.

Your multiple attack penalty doesn't apply to this free Strike, nor does it increase your multiple attack penalty.

cards.hero-trigger: Play when you are hit by a physical attack and you have a shield within reach and a free hand
cards.hero-description:
You Interact to draw and wield the shield, and then use it to Shield Block against the attack.

After the attack and block are resolved, the shield is torn from your grip and lands in an adjacent space.

cards.hero-trigger: Play when you take damage
cards.hero-description: Until the start of your next turn, any damage that would reduce you to 0 HP leaves you with 1HP remaining and gives you the Doomed 1 condition, or increases your Doomed value by 1.

cards.hero-trigger: Play when an ally is knocked unconscious or dies
cards.hero-description:
At the start of your next turn, you enter a rage*.

At the end of that turn, if you don't have the rage class feature, the rage ends and you are fatigued.


* +2 damage to melee strikes, -1 AC penalty, no concentrate actions (unless you have the Rage trait).

cards.hero-trigger: Play at the start of your turn
cards.hero-description:
Make a melee Strike against each foe within reach.

The multiple attack penalty doesn't apply to any of these attacks.

At the end of these attacks, your turn ends and you are fatigued.

cards.hero-trigger: Play at the start of your turn when you are dying
cards.hero-description:
You regain consciousness and can act normally on your turn, but can't regain HP or remove the dying condition during this turn.

At the end of your turn, you fall unconscious and your dying condition increases by 1.

cards.hero-trigger: Play after an enemy critically fails on a melee Strike against you
cards.hero-description: That enemy rerolls that attack, targeting one of its allies within its reach.

cards.hero-trigger: Play during your turn
cards.hero-description:
Until the end of your turn, you gain the benefits of greater cover after take the Hide or Sneak action, allowing you to Hide or Sneak in the open.

This effect ends if you do anything other than Hide, Sneak or Step.

cards.hero-trigger: Play during your turn, when you are out of Focus Points
cards.hero-description:
Gain 1 Focus Point that must be spent by the time of your next turn (or be lost).

If you use this Focus Point, you become Drained 1 or increase your Drained level.

cards.hero-trigger: Play during your turn
cards.hero-description:
For the rest of your turn, you gain a climb Speed and swim Speed equal to half your Speed.

If you make a horizontal Leap, increase the distance jumped by 10ft.

cards.hero-trigger: Play before making an attack roll for a ranged Strike
cards.hero-description: If the path of the Strike goes through another creature's space before reaching the target, the target is flat-footed against the attack, and the other creature doesn't provide cover.

cards.hero-trigger: Play after an enemy hits you with a ranged or melee Strike
cards.hero-description:
If the enemy rolled a Critical Success, it gets a regular Success instead.

If the enemy rolled a success, it deals minimum damage instead of rolling for damage.

cards.hero-trigger: Play after you learn about an enemy's resistance or immunity
cards.hero-description:
Until the end of your next turn, the enemy loses a resistance of your choice, or turns an immunity into a resistance.

You must be aware of the resistance either from seeing it shrug off damage from an attack, or due to a successful Recall Knowledge check.

cards.hero-trigger: Play when you Activate a magic item that Casts a Spell
cards.hero-description:
Heighten the spell by 1 level.

This can't heighten the item's spell above half your level, rounded up.


If the item wasn't consumed on use, you can't use the item again for 24h.

cards.hero-trigger: Play during your turn
cards.hero-description:
Give a creature you can see Resistance 5 to all damage until the start of your next turn.

If you are 7th level or higher, give Resistance 10 instead.

If you are 12th level or higher, give Resistance 15 instead.

cards.hero-trigger: Play when you or an ally is about to make a Strike
cards.hero-description:
The target rolls with advantage.

This strike deals an extra die of damage on a hit if the attacker has fewer than half their maximum HP, or two extra dice if they have fewer than a quater of their maximum HP.

cards.hero-trigger: Play during your turn
cards.hero-description:
Select yourself or an ally within 30ft.

The target regains 1d8+8 HP.

If you are 7th level or higher, the target regains 2d8+16 HP.

If you are 12th level or higher, the target regains 3d8+24 HP.

cards.hero-trigger: Play at the start of your turn or an ally's turn
cards.hero-description: The target is Quickened on its turn and can use the extra action only to take a single action with the Move trait.

cards.hero-trigger: Play when you or an ally is about to Cast a Spell
cards.hero-description:
Heighten that spell by 1 level.

This can't heighten a spell above the highest level of spell you or the ally can cast.

cards.hero-trigger: Play when an incapacitated ally or non-combatant NPC within sight takes damage from an attack or effect
cards.hero-description:
Prevent all the damage.

You take half the damage they would have taken, bypassing any Resistances and Immunities you might have.

You may only use this card to prevent damage to an ally if this ally is unable to act, such as when they are unconscious or paralyzed.

cards.hero-trigger: Play at the start of your turn or an ally's turn
cards.hero-description:
The target gains 4 actions instead of 3 3for their turn.

The 4th action can be spent as an extra reaction or be used as a normal action.

cards.hero-trigger: Play as a reaction when out of reactions
cards.hero-description: This allows you to use an extra reaction.

cards.hero-title: No, that's not how it happened
cards.hero-trigger: Play anytime the GM makes a roll
cards.hero-description: The GM must re-roll a single check.

cards.hero-trigger: Play when you or an ally just rolled a Critical Failure
cards.hero-description:
Turns the Critical Failure into a Failure.

This card can only be played on a Critical Failure not caused by a Natural 1.

cards.hero-trigger: Play when you are about to roll damage
cards.hero-description:
Each time you roll maximum on a dice, roll another dice and add its value to the previous total.

If you roll maximum again, continue this effect.

cards.hero-trigger: Play when you are about to roll damage
cards.hero-description:
Each time you roll minimum on a dice, roll another dice and add its value to the previous total.

If you roll minimum again, continue this effect.

cards.hero-trigger: Play when you roll on the Wild Magic table
cards.hero-description: Roll another time on the Wild Magic table, and choose the resulting effect from both rolls.

cards.hero-trigger: Play when casting a Focus Spell
cards.hero-description: You can cast a single Focus Spell without needing to spend a Focus Point.

cards.hero-trigger: Play during your turn
cards.hero-description: You or an ally within sight gains a number of temporary HP equal to your level.

cards.hero-trigger: Play after an ally other than you rolls
cards.hero-description: The target may reroll any dice they just rolled, and must pick the new result.

cards.hero-trigger: Play during your turn
cards.hero-description:
You can heal a wounded target by touching them and taking their injuries onto yourself.

You can transfer a number of HP to the target up to twice your level, at a ration of 1:1.

If this effect brings you below 0 HP, you instantly die, but the target is fully healed.

The damage you take from this effect bypass all Resistances and Immunities.

cards.hero-trigger: Play after you or an ally miss a Critical Success by 1
cards.hero-description:
You reduce the level required for a Critical Success by 1 for you or an ally within sight.

Ex. A DC 15 check would critically succeed on a 24 or higher, and a Natural 19 would count as a Critical Success.

cards.hero-trigger: Play after rolling for an Acrobatics or Athletics skill check.
cards.hero-description:
Your degree of success for that roll increases by 1.

A Critical Failure becomes a Failure, a Failure becomes a Success, and a Success becomes a Critical Success.

cards.hero-trigger: Play after rolling for an Arcana, any Lore, a Medicine, a Nature, an Occultism, a Religion, a Society or a Survival skill check.
cards.hero-description:
Your degree of success for that roll increases by 1.

A Critical Failure becomes a Failure, a Failure becomes a Success, and a Success becomes a Critical Success.

cards.hero-trigger: Play after rolling for a Deception, a Diplomacy, an Intimidation, a Performance or a Society skill check.
cards.hero-description:
Your degree of success for that roll increases by 1.

A Critical Failure becomes a Failure, a Failure becomes a Success, and a Success becomes a Critical Success.

cards.hero-trigger: Play after rolling for a Stealth or Thievery skill check.
cards.hero-description:
Your degree of success for that roll increases by 1.

A Critical Failure becomes a Failure, a Failure becomes a Success, and a Success becomes a Critical Success.

cards.hero-trigger: Play after rolling for a Perception skill check.
cards.hero-description:
Your degree of success for that roll increases by 1.

A Critical Failure becomes a Failure, a Failure becomes a Success, and a Success becomes a Critical Success.

cards.hero-trigger: Play when you rolled a Critical Success resulting from a Natural 20 roll on the attack dice on a target that cast a spell on their last turn
cards.hero-description:
The target must succeed on a Fortitude saving throw against your class DC.

On a Failure, the target can't activate magic items, cast spells, or use Quick Alchemy until the end of its next turn.

On a Critical Failure, the target can't activate magic items, cast spells or use Quick Alchemy until succeeding a Fortitude saving throw against your class DC as an action on its turn.

cards.hero-trigger: Play when you rolled a Critical Success resulting from a Natural 20 roll on the attack dice
cards.hero-description: The target takes 1d4 permanent bleed damage and is Sickened 3 until healed.

cards.hero-trigger: Play when you rolled a Critical Success resulting from a Natural 20 roll on the attack dice
cards.hero-description: Triple the damage instead of doubling it.

cards.hero-trigger: Play when you rolled a Critical Success resulting from a Natural 20 roll on the attack dice
cards.hero-description: The target is flat-footed for 1d4 turns.

cards.hero-trigger: Play when you rolled a Critical Success resulting from a Natural 20 roll on the attack dice
cards.hero-description: The attack ignores all resistances and immunities.

cards.hero-trigger: Play when you rolled a Critical Success resulting from a Natural 20 roll on the attack dice
cards.hero-description: The target must succeed at a Reflex save against your class DC or drop an item of your choice it is holding.

cards.hero-trigger: Play when you rolled a Critical Success resulting from a Natural 20 roll on the attack dice
cards.hero-description: The target is fatigued.

cards.hero-trigger: Play when you rolled a Critical Success resulting from a Natural 20 roll on the attack dice
cards.hero-description: The target is knocked prone and Stunned 2.

cards.hero-trigger: Play when you rolled a Critical Success resulting from a Natural 20 roll on the attack dice
cards.hero-description: Push the target up to 5fft times your STR modifier.

cards.hero-trigger: Play when you rolled a Critical Success resulting from a Natural 20 roll on the attack dice
cards.hero-description: The target gains Weakness 5 to any damage type dealt by the attack for 1 minute.

cards.hero-trigger: Play when you rolled a Critical Success resulting from a Natural 20 roll on the attack dice
cards.hero-description: Deal normal damage to one target adjacent to the original target.

cards.hero-trigger: Play when you rolled a Critical Success resulting from a Natural 20 roll on the attack dice
cards.hero-description:
Roll to hit with the same weapon or Spell.

If the attack is successful, add the damage of the 2nd attack to the total damage.


This free attack doesn't increase your multiple attack penalty or expend a spell slot.


If the attack roll of the free attack is also a Natural 20, you may apply the effect of this card to the new attack.

cards.hero-trigger: Play when you rolled a Critical Success resulting from a Natural 20 roll on the attack dice
cards.hero-description: Anyone can attempt Attacks of Opportunity on the target until the end of the target's next turn, even if the ally doesn't have the Attack of Opportunity feat.

cards.hero-trigger: Play when you rolled a Critical Success resulting from a Natural 20 roll on the attack dice
cards.hero-description: The target must succeed a DC 5 flat check, or be unable to cast spells with the verbal component until healed.

cards.hero-trigger: Play when you rolled a Critical Success resulting from a Natural 20 roll on the attack dice
cards.hero-description: The target and each enemy adjacent to it must succeed at a Reflex saving throw against your class DC or be knocked prone.

cards.hero-trigger: Play when you rolled a Critical Success resulting from a Natural 20 roll on the attack dice
cards.hero-description:
The target must roll a flat d20.

If the result of the roll is a Natural 1, the target dies instantly if it has less than half it's HP or less than 100 HP, whichever is greater.

If the result of the roll is a Natural 20, the target takes no damage from the attack.

cards.hero-trigger: Play when you rolled a Critical Success resulting from a Natural 20 roll on the attack dice
cards.hero-description: The target takes half the inflicted damage at the end of its next turn.

cards.hero-trigger: Play when you rolled a Critical Success resulting from a Natural 20 roll on the attack dice
cards.hero-description: You become invisible to the target until the end of your next turn, or until you use a hostile action against the target.

cards.hero-trigger: Play when you rolled a Critical Success resulting from a Natural 20 roll on the attack dice
cards.hero-description:
The target must succeed a Fortitude Saving throw against your class DC.


On a Critical Failure: The target is Petrified for 2d4 turns.

On a Failure: The target is Petrified for 1d4 turns.

cards.hero-trigger: Play when you rolled a Critical Success resulting from a Natural 20 roll on the attack dice
cards.hero-description: You gain a +2 Circumstance bonus to all attack rolls until the end off your next turn.

cards.hero-trigger: Play when you rolled a Critical Success resulting from a Natural 20 roll on the attack dice on a melee attack
cards.hero-description:
You can attempt to Grapple the target as a Free action.

This ignores the multiple attack penalty and doesn't count toward your multiple attack penalty.

cards.hero-trigger: Play when you rolled a Critical Success resulting from a Natural 20 roll on the attack dice on a spell or bomb attack
cards.hero-description: The target is restrained, using your class DC as the DC to escape.

cards.hero-trigger: Play when you rolled a Critical Success resulting from a Natural 20 roll on the attack dice
cards.hero-description: Deal an additional 1d8 damage to the target and heal yourself for the same amount.

cards.hero-trigger: Play when you rolled a Critical Success resulting from a Natural 20 roll on the attack dice on a spell or bomb attack
cards.hero-description: Roll four times on the Wild Magic table, and choose the desired effect.

cards.hero-trigger: Play when you rolled a Critical Success resulting from a Natural 20 roll on the attack dice
cards.hero-description: The target is blinded until the end of its next turn.

cards.hero-trigger: Play when you rolled a Critical Success resulting from a Natural 20 roll on the attack dice on a spell or bomb attack
cards.hero-description: You and the target switch places. This is a teleportation effect.

cards.hero-trigger: Play when you rolled a Critical Success resulting from a Natural 20 roll on the attack dice
cards.hero-description:
The target laughs uncontrollably until the end of its next turn.

While laughing, it is Slowed 1 and can't use reactions.

cards.hero-trigger: Play when you rolled a Critical Success resulting from a Natural 20 roll on the attack dice on an Aberration, Celestial, Dragon, Fey, Fiend, Monitor or Undead
cards.hero-description: Triple the damage instead of doubling it.

cards.hero-trigger: Play when you rolled a Critical Success resulting from a Natural 20 roll on the attack dice
cards.hero-description: The target is Slowed 1 for 1 round, and is also Doomed 1.

cards.hero-trigger: Play when you rolled a Critical Success resulting from a Natural 20 roll on the attack dice
cards.hero-description: The target is Frightened 3.

cards.hero-trigger: Play when you rolled a Critical Success resulting from a Natural 20 roll on the attack dice on a spell attack
cards.hero-description: spell or spell slot is not expended unless the spell level was the highest available at your class level.

cards.hero-trigger: Play when you rolled a Critical Success resulting from a Natural 20 roll on the attack dice
cards.hero-description: The target is confused for 1 minute or until healed.

cards.hero-trigger: Play when you rolled a Critical Success resulting from a Natural 20 roll on the attack dice
cards.hero-description: The target must roll a DC15 Reflex save or catch fire, taking 1d6 fire damage instantly, and subsequently at the beginning of each of its turns until he succeeds another Reflex saving throw as an action.

cards.hero-trigger: Play when you rolled a Critical Success resulting from a Natural 20 roll on the attack dice and you have fewer than half your maximum HP
cards.hero-description: You can choose to inflict up to twice your level extra amount of damage equal to the target, that is also inflicted upon yourself.
